original: 鑑於魏宗室衰微，帝室孤弱，終致滅亡之教訓...乃大封皇族為藩王，間接導致後來的「八王之亂」。
text: In view of the decline of the Wei clan and the loneliness of the imperial clan, the lesson of the eventual demise... It is the fact that the imperial clan was the vassal king, which indirectly led to the subsequent "Eight Kings Rebellion."
